trans-unit.source: Specifies the root DN of the point in your hierarchy from which to begin a guest or anonymous search for the user's DN. For example:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the root DN of the point in your hierarchy from which to begin a guest or anonymous search for the user's DN.

target.mrk: Specifies the root DN of the point in your hierarchy from which to begin a guest or anonymous search for the user's DN.

trans-unit.source: When using Netscape Directory Server, set this property to the root DN, the special entry to which access control does not apply.

seg-source.mrk: When using Netscape Directory Server, set this property to the root DN, the special entry to which access control does not apply.

target.mrk: When using Netscape Directory Server, set this property to the root DN, the special entry to which access control does not apply.

trans-unit.source: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

target.mrk: For more information about LDAP user authentication, see the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase= ou=people,o=example.com -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase', 'ou=people,o=example.com')

seg-source.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase= ou=people,o=example.com -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase', 'ou=people,o=example.com')

target.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase= ou=people,o=example.com -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchBase', 'ou=people,o=example.com')

trans-unit.source: Static. For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect. For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

target.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.
